MacroUsage.name: MacroUsage
MacroUsage.description: Represents macro usage on a record, including which macro was used, who used it, and how they used it.

AppContext.description: Context in which the macro was run. Possible values are: Aloha—Salesforce Classic Lightning—Lightning Experience Unknown

ConditionCount.description: Number of conditional instructions contained in the macro at execution.

ContextRecord.description: ID of the record on which the macro was run.

DurationInMs.description: The execution time, in milliseconds, for the macro.

ExecutedInstructionCount.description: The number of macro instructions that ran successfully. If the macro completed successfully, this value is the same as InstructionCount.

ExecutionEndTime.description: The time at which macro execution completed.

ExecutionState.description: The end state of macro execution. Possible values are SUCCESS FAILURE CANCELED

FailureReason.description: If ExecutionState is failure, this field stores the reason for the failure. Possible values are: ACCESS GENERIC TIMEOUT UNSUPPORTED

FolderId.description: ID of the folder containing the macro at the time it was used.

InstructionCount.description: The number of instructions in the macro at the start of execution.

IsFromBulk.description: If true, the macro was run as a bulk macro. When a bulk macro is run on multiple records, usage is recorded per record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the group or user that owns the macro.

UserId.description: ID of the user that ran the macro.
